wireframe

Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • wireframe.AbstractElement
      • wireframe.Annotation

  • public class Annotation
extends AbstractElement
    A wireframe element that can be attached to another element for the purpose of displaying useful information about that element. Can have its text edited, moved, resized, and hidden. Must be linked to an existing wireframe element. If its linked element is deleted, the annotation will be dereferenced and deleted as well.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Annotation(AbstractWireframeElement linkedElement, Location location)
      Constructs an Annotation linked to specified linkedElement at specified location Defaults the text to "Annotation" and displays it.
